file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 38-33-03-06 - MUFFLER - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MUFFLER - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the inspection/check of the muffler assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 38-33-03-200-801-A MUFFLER ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 38-33-03 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-33-03-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MUFFLER ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION A. General (1) The function of this inspection is to make sure that there is no damage in the muffler assembly. (2) The muffler assembly is installed in the lavatory and is part of the wash-basin drain system. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Inspection - Muffler Assembly (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) To do the inspection of the muffler assembly, have a direct source of good lighting. Examine the muffler assembly vents for easily seen cracks, damage, and/or blockage of airflow. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 38-33-03 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
